channel.title: Question about [508]
channel.description:
Hello, i have one question about 508 server :confused: :
its about Umairscape v4 , il compiled all things together and only : run.bat works. but i need to have ''all'' working i got java jdk 1.6.0_07 i can get on/in the game but not many commands and if i teleport or walk away its disconnect :S
if i open ''all'' its says nothing and it stays black , after 4 mins it says : prees any key to close/ continue
any1 have an idea? :D :confused: :|

item.title: Question about [508]
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

[quote=“dsv.13, post:1, topic:245212”]Hello, i have one question about 508 server :

its about Umairscape v4 , il compiled all things together and only : run.bat works. but i need to have ‘‘all’’ working i got java jdk 1.6.0_07
i can get on/in the game but not many commands and if i teleport or walk away its disconnect :S

if i open ‘‘all’’ its says nothing and it stays black , after 4 mins it says : prees any key to close/ continue

any1 have an idea? :|[/quote]

The press any key means it has finished, and tell me what have you changed to the source to make it disconnect you? or rather what teleport did you use.

Change source. You can use my release , http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,320983

I Suggest using pali’s NIO source, but other than that…“sex sex scape”, it would be nice to nto have 13 year olds making servers that they added/moved some npcs around on the forums.

Read full topic
